comments:
Well, that was a bad example of pressing "Enter" early if ever there was.

My actual comment is:
I was moving around my editor and it so happened that an empty space was created
underneath the editors as if another editor should go there.

When trying to re-locate my existing editors to this blank spot or do certain
re-adjustments, I got various NPE's and IndexOutofBoundsExceptions

For example, my log entries appear as:

I wasn't sure if it should go to UI or SWT (or neither) so please forgive my
intrusion :)

I'll append a screenshot and log file.

Created an attachment (id=13977)
Screenshot :)

You can see the blank space in the middle and the outline of where I was
attempting to move an editor.  Attempting to move an editor there brought about
the IndexOutOfBounds.

"java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Index out of bounds" is the specified 
behaviour for CTabFolder.getItem.

Moving to UI team to determine why they are calling the API with an invalid 
value.

Is this still a problem in 3.3?

PW
